page.title: 10Housing Survey
page.content: On Monday 8th July we went out on a walk to identify the houses in our block.Most of the houses in Keynsham are post-war,although Manor Road is one of the oldest parts of Keynsham. Some of the houses there are pre-war. We walked along 7 roads.We made a survey of the types of houses,how old they are and what they are made from. We went through Chandag Road,Hurn Lane, Evenlode Way,Waveney Road,Medway Drive, Manor Road and Wellsway. These are the types of houses we looked for:- Terraced Bungalow Semi-Detached Cottage Detached Linked There are six shops near the school in a terrace.They are a butcher,off- license,greengrocer/fishmongers,news- agents,post office/drapery/household goods.
